title: MC_DIRECTION (Enum)
text:
TYPE MC_DIRECTION :
Specifies the direction of a movement.
Please note that not all modes can be applied to all function blocks
and axis types (modulo/finite).

rows.Name: fastest
rows.Comment:
Selects the direction automatically in order to reach the target
position as fast as possible (only modulo axes).

rows.Name: current
rows.Comment:
Keeps the current direction to reach the target (only modulo
axes).

rows.Name: shortest
rows.Comment:
Selects the direction according to the shortest distance
(only modulo axes).
